remarks: Cancellation law for vector subtraction ( ~ npcan analog).  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmod4.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmod4.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvaddsub4.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodvnpcan $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( A .- B ) .+ B ) = A ) $.
